languages.text: "Пучина не будет просто смотреть на нас сегодня, о нет. Сегодня мы будем кидать в нее камни и умолять сожрать нас". {n}Последние слова хормейстер произносит с горькой ухмылкой висельника, которому только что назначили день казни.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Даем окно выбора ростера с залоченной Идирой, после чего затемнение, начинаем обряд
Даем окно выбора ростера с залоченной Идирой, после чего затемнение, начинаем обряд

languages.text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пучина не будет просто смотреть на нас сегодня, о нет. Сегодня мы будем кидать в нее камни и умолять сожрать нас". {n}Последние слова хормейстер произносит с горькой ухмылкой висельника, которому только что назначили день казни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Why, the abyss will do a lot more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter grin of a condemned man who's just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

"Why, the abyss will do a lot more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter grin of a condemned man who's just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

"Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

languages.text: «El abismo hará mucho más que devolvernos la mirada hoy. Vamos a tirarle piedras y rogarle que nos devore». {n}El maestro del Coro pronuncia las últimas palabras con la sonrisa amarga de un reo al que acaban de comunicar la fecha de su ahorcamiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El abismo hará mucho más que devolvernos la mirada hoy. Vamos a tirarle piedras y rogarle que nos devore». {n}El maestro del Coro pronuncia las últimas palabras con la sonrisa amarga de un reo al que acaban de comunicar la fecha de su ahorcamiento.{/n}

languages.text: 「深淵は今日、こちらを見つめる以上のことをすると言うことか。深淵に石を投げ、我々を貪り尽くせと懇願するのだな」{n}クワイアーマスターは、今しがた絞首刑の日を知らされた死刑囚のように苦笑いを浮かべ、最後にポツポツと言葉を吐いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「深淵は今日、こちらを見つめる以上のことをすると言うことか。深淵に石を投げ、我々を貪り尽くせと懇願するのだな」{n}クワイアーマスターは、今しがた絞首刑の日を知らされた死刑囚のように苦笑いを浮かべ、最後にポツポツと言葉を吐いた。{/n}

languages.text: “看来，深渊今天不仅仅是要盯着我们了。我们这么做，简直相当于朝它扔石头，惹怒它，逼着它把我们一口吞掉。”{n}唱诗大师说出最后几个字时，脸上满是苦笑，仿佛死刑犯得知了上绞架的日子一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看来，深渊今天不仅仅是要盯着我们了。我们这么做，简直相当于朝它扔石头，惹怒它，逼着它把我们一口吞掉。”{n}唱诗大师说出最后几个字时，脸上满是苦笑，仿佛死刑犯得知了上绞架的日子一样。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Abgrund wird heute sehr viel mehr tun, als nur zurückzustarren. Wir werden Steine hineinwerfen und ihn anflehen, uns zu verschlingen." {n}Der Chormeister spricht die letzten Worte mit der verbitterten Miene eines verurteilten Mannes, dem soeben der Tag seiner Hinrichtung verkündet wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Abgrund wird heute sehr viel mehr tun, als nur zurückzustarren. Wir werden Steine hineinwerfen und ihn anflehen, uns zu verschlingen." {n}Der Chormeister spricht die letzten Worte mit der verbitterten Miene eines verurteilten Mannes, dem soeben der Tag seiner Hinrichtung verkündet wurde.{/n}

languages.text: « Ma foi, les abysses vont faire bien plus que de tourner leur regard vers nous aujourd'hui. Nous nous apprêtons à leur jeter des cailloux avant de nous livrer corps et âme à leurs mâchoires dévorantes. » {n}Le maître de chœur prononce ces dernières paroles avec le rictus amer d'un condamné qui viendrait d'apprendre la date de sa pendaison.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi, les abysses vont faire bien plus que de tourner leur regard vers nous aujourd'hui. Nous nous apprêtons à leur jeter des cailloux avant de nous livrer corps et âme à leurs mâchoires dévorantes. » {n}Le maître de chœur prononce ces dernières paroles avec le rictus amer d'un condamné qui viendrait d'apprendre la date de sa pendaison.{/n}

languages.text: "Ah ki ah! Uçurum, bugün bize bakmaktan çok daha fazlasını yapacak. İçine taş atıp bizi yutması için yalvaracağız." {n}Koro Şefi, son sözleri sarf ederken acı bir şekilde gülümsüyor. Asılacağı günü öğrenen, hükümlü bir adamı andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, the abyss will do so much more than stare at us today. We will be throwing stones into it and begging it to devour us." {n}The Choirmaster speaks the last few words with the bitter smirk of a condemned man who has just been told the day of his hanging.{/n}
